short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for background image customization of New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-- Background Customization - New Tab -- 

By clicking "Add to Chrome," I accept and agree to installing the extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://background-customization-newtab.com/terms and privacy policy https://background-customization-newtab.com/privacy.

Comes with options to change to beautiful wallpapers.
 
For more information, please refer to our:

Terms of Service
https://background-customization-newtab.com/terms

Privacy Policy
https://background-customization-newtab.com/privacy

About Us
https://background-customization-newtab.com/about
